title: CKY & FIEND WITHOUT A FACE Announce UK Tour
description: Happening this November! The post CKY & FIEND WITHOUT A FACE Announce UK Tour appeared first on Metal Injection.
author: Greg Kennelty
byline: By Greg Kennelty Published 6 hours ago
text: CKY and Fiend Without A Face – one of the bands Brent Hinds is going full-steam on now that he's out of Mastodon – is hitting the road (mostly) this November for a UK tour. The tour kicks off on October 31 at O2 Academy 2 and wraps up on November 21 at the O2 Academy Islington in London, UK. Tickets are available here. CKY said of the trek: "This fall, CKY returns for our first headline tour of the UK and Ireland in over five years, and we'll be joined by our good friend Brent Hinds of Fiend Without A Face!" 10/31 Oxford, UK O2 Academy 211/1 Birmingham, UK O2 Institute 211/2 Torquay, UK Foundry11/3 Southampton, UK 186511/4 Bristol, UK Fleece11/6 Swansea, UK Patti Pavilion11/9 Nottingham, UK Rescue Rooms11/10 Newcastle, UK Digital11/11 Birkenhead, UK Future Yard11/12 Manchester, UK Club Academy11/14 Belfast, IRE Limelight 211/15 Dublin, IRE Opium Rooms11/17 Glasgow, UK Garage11/18 Leeds, UK Key Club11/19 Sheffield, UK Corporation11/20 Norwich, UK Waterfront11/21 London, UK O2 Academy Islington Want More Metal? html:
CKY and Fiend Without A Face – one of the bands Brent Hinds is going full-steam on now that he's out of Mastodon – is hitting the road (mostly) this November for a UK tour. The tour kicks off on October 31 at O2 Academy 2 and wraps up on November 21 at the O2 Academy Islington in London, UK. Tickets are available here.

CKY said of the trek: "This fall, CKY returns for our first headline tour of the UK and Ireland in over five years, and we'll be joined by our good friend Brent Hinds of Fiend Without A Face!"

10/31 Oxford, UK O2 Academy 2
11/1 Birmingham, UK O2 Institute 2
11/2 Torquay, UK Foundry
11/3 Southampton, UK 1865
11/4 Bristol, UK Fleece

11/18 Leeds, UK Key Club
11/19 Sheffield, UK Corporation
11/20 Norwich, UK Waterfront
11/21 London, UK O2 Academy Islington
